typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.t_crossreference\nwhere code_type_id = 774',
	format: 'query') ~> tcross
tcross derive(pk_key_claim = concat(source_system,source_code_key),
		{} = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
